alert.note: Alert for Block Island; Newport; Washington (Rhode Island) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Rip Current Statement issued August 29 at 2:29AM EDT until August 29 at 6:00PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...HIGH RIP CURRENT RISK IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM EDT THIS MORNING THROUGH THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Dangerous rip currents expected. * WHERE...Washington, Southern Bristol MA, Southern Plymouth MA, Barnstable MA, Dukes MA, Nantucket MA, and Newport RI Counties. * WHEN...From 6 AM EDT this morning through this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Rip currents can sweep even the best swimmers away from shore into deeper water. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Risk for rip currents will continue into tonight and Wednesday, and additional statements or high surf advisories may be needed.
info.instruction: Swim near a lifeguard. If caught in a rip current, relax and float. Don`t swim against the current. If able, swim in a direction following the shoreline. If unable to escape, face the shore and call or wave for help.
